tetra/schematic/sword/rapier_blade.name: Rapier blade
tetra/schematic/sword/rapier_blade.descr:
Replace the current sword blade with a rapier, an elegant blade.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra.module.sword/rapier_blade.name: Rapier
tetra.module.sword/rapier_blade.descript: A light, swift and elegant blade.
tetra/schematic/sword/flamberge_blade.de:
Replace the current sword blade with a flamberge.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra.module.sword/flamberge_blade.name: Flamberge
Contains knowledge on how to forge flamberge blades
tetra/schematic/sword/crucible_blade.des:
Replace the current sword blade with a crucible blade.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra.module.sword/crucible_blade.name: Crucible
tetra.module.sword/crucible_blade.descri: Rip and Tear, until it is done.
item.tetra.scroll.tetra/crucible_blade.d: Contains knowledge on how to forge the Crucible
tetra/schematic/double/tomahawk/tomahawk:
A tomahawk axe head. Used from throwing at others.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra.module.double/tomahawk.name: Tomahawk head
tetra.module.double/tomahawk.description: A tomahawk axe head, can be thrown at enemies to attack them
tetra/schematic/single/head/halberd_head:
Forge a halberd head from the given material. Halberds make for an ideal ranged melee weapon, granting stun and armor penetration.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
Material §fdensity§r slightly increases §fdamage§r and slightly decreases §fattack speed§r.
tetra.module.single/halberd_head.name: Halberd head
tetra.module.single/halberd_head.descrip: A halberd head, an ideal ranged melee weapon that grants stun and armor penetration.
item.tetra.scroll.single/head/halberd_he: Contains knowledge on how to forge halberd heads
tetra/schematic/sword/saber_blade.name: Saber blade
tetra/schematic/sword/saber_blade.descri:
Replace the current sword blade with a saber, a regal and militant blade.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra.module.sword/saber_blade.name: Saber
tetra/schematic/sword/key_guard.name: Key guard
tetra/schematic/sword/key_guard.descript:
Craft a key guard which protects the hand, as well as giving the player a special moxxy.
 
Material §fhardness§r and §fflexibility§r increases the armor amount.
tetra.module.sword/key_guard.name: Key guard
tetra.module.sword/key_guard.description: A key guard which both protects the hand, as well as gives the player a special moxxy in their attitude.
item.tetra.scroll.sword/key_guard.name: Key guards
item.tetra.scroll.sword/key_guard.descri: Contains knowledge on how to forge key guards
tetra/schematic/single/head/mace_head/ma:
Forge a mace head from the given material. Maces are a strong melee weapon, stuning enemies and crushing their armor.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
Material §fdensity§r slightly increases §fdamage§r and slightly decreases §fattack speed§r.
tetra.module.single/mace_head.name: Mace head
tetra.module.single/mace_head.descriptio: A mace head, a strong melee weapon, capabile of stunning enemies and crushing their armor.
item.tetra.scroll.single/head/mace_head/: Contains knowledge on how to forge mace heads
tetra.module.bow/dreadnought_stave.name: Dreadnought stave
tetra.module.bow/dreadnought_stave.descr: A dreadnough bow stave. Dreadnought staves are more powerful than typical bow staves.
tetra/schematic/bow/stave/dreadnought_st:
Replaces the stave with a dreadnought stave crafted from the given materials. Dreadnought staves are more powerful than typical bow staves.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fstrength§r and §fdraw time§r.
Material §fflexibility§r increases §fstrength§r and slightly decreases §fdraw time§r.
tetra.variant.sword_socket/nether_star.d:
A Nether Star, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The star is enchanted and provides arcane boons to the wielder of the sword.
 
The star is of great quality, provinding all of combined effects of the gems.
A Nether Star, fitted onto the side of the tool head. The star is enchanted and provides magical boons to the tool's wielder.
 
The star is of great quality, provinding all of combined effects of the gems.
A Nether Star, attached where the head meets the handle. The star is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.
 
The star is of great quality, provinding all of combined effects of the gems.
tetra/schematic/double/void_worm_pickaxe: A pickaxe head made from the Void Worm mandibles, nothing personal kid.
tetra.module.double/void_worm_pickaxe.de: A pickaxe head made from the Void Worm mandibles, nothing personal kid.
tetra.variant.sword_socket/void_worm_eye:
A legendary Void Worm Eye, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt.
 
A god does not fear death, thus provinding all of combined effects of the gems.
tetra.variant.double_socket/void_worm_ey:
A legendary Void Worm Eye, fitted onto the side of the tool head.
 
A god does not fear death, thus provinding all of combined effects of the gems.
tetra.variant.single_socket/void_worm_ey:
A legendary Void Worm Eye, attached where the head meets the handle.
 
A god does not fear death, thus provinding all of combined effects of the gems.
A blade made from the mandible of the Devourer-I mean-Void Worm.

tetra.module.sword/shifting_blade.descri: A strange blade made from amethyst blocks. Its properties give it a magical edge.

tetra/schematic/shield/plate/kite.name: Kite plate
tetra/schematic/shield/plate/kite.descri: Craft a kite shield plate, kite shields can block for an indefinite with no cooldown, and has a lower ability cooldown that a tower shield.
